properties.areaDesc: Presque Isle Light to Sturgeon Pt MI Including Thunder Bay National Marine Sanctuary; 5NM East of Mackinac Bridge to Presque Isle Light MI including Bois Blanc Island
properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued January 20 at 10:12AM EST until January 20 at 8:00PM EST by NWS Gaylord MI
properties.description:
* WHAT...Highest gusts up to 25 kt and highest waves around 5
feet expected.

* WHERE...Presque Isle Light to Sturgeon Pt MI Including Thunder
Bay National Marine Sanctuary and 5NM East of Mackinac Bridge
to Presque Isle Light MI including Bois Blanc Island.

* WHEN...Until 8 PM EST this evening.

* IMPACTS...Conditions will be hazardous to small craft.
properties.instruction:
Inexperienced mariners, especially those operating smaller
vessels, should avoid navigating in hazardous conditions.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 PM EST THIS EVENING
